column1: All right, men, listen up! Looks like our thieves are trying to hide out here. They've got the employees and some school kids held hostage.
Everyone stay on your toes! These are professionals we're dealing with here!
Too bad! You'll be going away for a long time. Was it worth it?
All right, Manson, we know you're in there! Come out peacefully, and we'll shoot you!
Oh, yeah. That's a good idea.  Come out peacefully, and we won't shoot you!
